title: 2 teens arrested in connection with spate of Houston bike trail robberies
description: Two teens have been arrested in connection with a spate of robberies and assaults along a Houston bike trail, as police look for more suspects, authorities said.

title: Two dead after small plane deploys parachute, crashes in western New York
description: The pilot of a small plane and his passenger were killed when the aircraft crashed and caught fire in western New York

title: Man fatally shot at cemetery during burial of 10-year-old gun violence victim
description: Authorities are investigating a fatal shooting Tuesday afternoon at a cemetery in Prince George's County, Maryland.

title: Activist pleads guilty to federal charge in 2020 Philadelphia protest
description: A well-known west Philadelphia activist has pleaded guilty to a felony.

title: Detroit clerk who locked door before customers were shot will face trial
description: A Detroit gas station clerk will stand trial for involuntary manslaughter

title: Man pleads guilty to strangling and dumping body of Missouri woman 3 decades ago
description: A newspaper is reporting that a 67-year-old man has pleaded guilty to killing a Missouri woman in 1987

title: Parents warned to stop using recalled Boppy loungers
description: Parents are being warned to stop using and buying Boppy newborn loungers, two years after they were first recalled following eight infant deaths.

title: Cuba Gooding Jr. settles lawsuit with woman who accused him of rape
description: Cuba Gooding Jr. has settled his lawsuit with a woman who accused him of raping her in a New York City hotel room 10 years ago.

title: Unlawful southern border entries down 70% since end of Title 42
description: Unlawful southern border entries have decreased 70% from record highs since end of Title 42, according to DHS.

title: Canadian company pleads guilty to shipping banned seal oil to US
description: A Canadian company has pleaded guilty to violating federal law by illegally selling seal oil capsules to American customers

title: Browns defensive players robbed of jewelry, vehicle by masked men in downtown stickup
description: Two Cleveland Browns defensive players were robbed at gun point by six masked men outside a downtown night club, according to police

title: OpenAI CEO suggests agency like UN's nuclear watchdog to oversee AI
description: An innovator warns of artificial intelligence's "existential risk" to humanity.

title: Finnish businessman handed nearly $130K speeding ticket
description: Multi-millionaire Anders Wiklöf is one of Finland’s richest men.

title: Ukraine brands Russia 'terrorist state' in case against Russia at top UN court
description: Lawyers for Ukraine have told the United Nations’ top court that Russia bankrolled a “campaign of intimidation and terror” by rebels in eastern Ukraine starting in 2014 and sought to replace Crimea’s multiethnic community with “discriminatory Russian n...

title: World Bank offers dim outlook for the global economy in face of higher interest rates
description: The global economy is likely slowing sharply this year, hobbled by high interest rates, the repercussions of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine and the lingering effects of the coronavirus pandemic

title: Ex Formula One boss Ecclestone pleads not guilty to fraud charge
description: Former Formula One boss Bernie Ecclestone has formally pleaded not guilty to a fraud charge over his alleged failure to declare millions of dollars held in a trust in Singapore

title: PGA Tour to merge with Saudi-backed LIV Golf
description: The PGA Tour has announced it will be merging operations under a single owner with its rival, >the Saudi-backed LIV Golf, as well as the DP World Tour.

title: SEC brings charges against cryptocurrency trading platform Coinbase
description: Shares of Coinbase Global tumbled nearly 17% before the market open on Tuesday.

title: 4.9 magnitude quake strikes southern Haiti; at least 3 dead
description: Authorities in Haiti say that three people have been killed when a 4.9 magnitude earthquake struck the south of the country

title: Astrud Gilberto, singer of 'The Girl from Ipanema,' dead at 83
description: The Brazilian singer and songwriter became the voice of bossa nova.

title: Pope briefly at hospital for tests two months after bronchitis, returns to Vatican
description: Pope Francis has made a quick trip to a hospital for tests and returned to the Vatican, two months after he was hospitalized with an acute case of bronchitis

title: Strategically vital Nova Khakovka dam blown up near border between Ukraine and Russia
description: A section of a strategically vital Ukrainian dam and hydroelectric powerplant under Russian control has been blown up as both Ukraine and Russia are blaming each other.

title: Apple CEO Tim Cook says Vision Pro is 'tomorrow's engineering, today': Exclusive
description: Cook also called on tech companies to self-regulate as they develop AI.

title: Prince Harry gives historic testimony in tabloid phone hacking case
description: Harry is the first British royal to testify in court in over 100 years.

title: Mom of 6-year-old who shot his teacher will plead guilty to new charges: Lawyer
description: Deja Taylor was accused of unlawful use of marijuana in possession of a handgun and making a false statement about her drug use during the purchase of the firearm

title: Germany detains 2nd man over fatal arson attack on refugee shelter in 1991
description: German authorities detained a second man Tuesday in connection with a racist arson attack on a shelter for asylum-seekers 32 years ago in which a Ghanaian man was killed

title: Prince Harry arrives at High Court for testimony in phone hacking case
description: Prince Harry has arrived at a London court ahead of his testimony against a tabloid publisher he accuses of phone hacking and other unlawful snooping

title: Chris Christie, one of GOP's loudest anti-Trump voices, kicks off White House bid
description: Former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie is set to launch his presidential campaign Tuesday, joining a crowded -- and still growing -- GOP primary field including Trump

title: Trump opposes Michael Cohen seeking to end lawsuit alleging breach of fiduciary duty
description: Donald Trump has opposed an attempt by Michael Cohen to dismiss a lawsuit that accused Cohen of breaching his fiduciary duty to Trump “by spreading falsehoods.”

title: Ukraine accuses Russia of destroying major dam near Kherson
description: Ukraine on Tuesday accused Russian forces of blowing up a major dam in a part of southern Ukraine they control, alerting residents further along the Dnipro River to evacuate and warning of flooding downstream

title: Hollywood actors guild votes to authorize strike, as writers strike continues
description: Actors represented by the Hollywood union SAG-AFTRA voted to authorize a strike if the major studios, streamers and production companies don’t meet their demands for a new contract by June 30

title: Too many people in NYC are stopped, searched and frisked illegally, federal monitor says
description: A federal monitor says she has found disappointing results when she studied the legality of New York City's new initiative to combat gun violence in high-crime areas with an old tactic of stopping and frisking people

title: Ex-correctional officer at federal prison in California convicted of sexual misconduct
description: A federal correctional officer has been convicted of sexually abusing two inmates at a women’s prison in California where the warden and other employees were charged with similar conduct

title: Microsoft will pay $20M to settle U.S. charges of illegally collecting children's data
description: Microsoft will pay a fine of $20 million to settle Federal Trade Commission charges that it illegally collected and retained the data of children who signed up to use its Xbox video game console

title: NYPD safety team making high number of unlawful stops, mostly people of color: Report
description: A decade after the NYPD's stop-and-frisk tactic was deemed unconstitutional, the police are still making unlawfull stops and searches, according to a new report.

title: After 6 women found dead, Portland officials warn against serial killer speculation
description: The Portland Police Bureau in Oregon took a strong stance against “online rumors” Sunday, shutting down theories of a serial killer after the deaths of six women.
